title: THE HU Announces European Tour Around Festival Dates
description: Kicking off on on June 6 at Gashouder in Maastricht, NL.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 3 hours ago
excerpt: Kicking off on on June 6 at Gashouder in Maastricht, NL.
text: The Hu has announced a pretty lengthy European tour around their appearances at festivals like Hellfest, Graspop Metal Meeting, Roskilde, and more. The festival kicks off on June 6 at Gashouder in Maastricht, NL, and wraps up over one month later at Kucukciftlik Park in Istanbul, TR. Tickets are available here. 6/6 Maastricht, NL Gashouder (w/ Heilung)6/7 Stuttgart, DE LKA Longhorn6/8 Mannheim, DE Open Air (w/ Heilung)6/10 Nancy, FR L'autre Canal6/11 Dijon, FR La Vapeur6/12 Nuremberg, DE Z-Bau6/14 Lingen, DE EmslandArena (w/ Heilung)6/15 Braunschweig, DE Open Air AM Braunschweig6/17 Dortmund, DE FZW6/18 Groningen, NL De Oosterport6/20 Clisson, FR Hellfest6/19 6/22 Dessel, BE Graspop6/23 Bratislava, SK Refinery Gallery6/25 Sofia, BG Kolodrum Open Air6/26 Bucharest, RO Open Air Theatre6/30 Ljubljana, SI Kino Siska7/1 Munich, DE TollWood (w/ Heilung)7/2 Dunaujvaros, HU Rockmaraton Festival7/4 Roskilde, DK Roskilde7/5 Königstein, DE Festung Königstein (w/ Heilung)7/8 Kiel, DE Wunderino Arena (w/ Heilung)7/10 Wroclaw, PL Hala Stulecia (w/ Heilung)7/12 Saarbrücken, DE Garage Open Air (w/ Heilung)7/13 Vizovice, CZ Masters of Rock7/16 Istanbul, TR Kucukciftlik Park Want More Metal? html:
The Hu has announced a pretty lengthy European tour around their appearances at festivals like Hellfest, Graspop Metal Meeting, Roskilde, and more. The festival kicks off on June 6 at Gashouder in Maastricht, NL, and wraps up over one month later at Kucukciftlik Park in Istanbul, TR. Tickets are available here.

6/6 Maastricht, NL Gashouder (w/ Heilung)
6/7 Stuttgart, DE LKA Longhorn
6/8 Mannheim, DE Open Air (w/ Heilung)
6/10 Nancy, FR L'autre Canal
6/11 Dijon, FR La Vapeur
6/12 Nuremberg, DE Z-Bau

6/30 Ljubljana, SI Kino Siska
7/1 Munich, DE TollWood (w/ Heilung)
7/2 Dunaujvaros, HU Rockmaraton Festival
7/4 Roskilde, DK Roskilde
7/5 Königstein, DE Festung Königstein (w/ Heilung)
7/8 Kiel, DE Wunderino Arena (w/ Heilung)

7/12 Saarbrücken, DE Garage Open Air (w/ Heilung)

7/16 Istanbul, TR Kucukciftlik Park
